definitions.definition: Installer. A software utility that installs an application.
definitions.example: After inserting the disk, you need to run the install.

definitions.definition: An installation. (Usage originated as a truncated form of the word installation.)
To connect, set up or prepare something for use.
definitions.example: I haven't installed the new operating system yet because of all the bugs.

definitions.definition: To admit formally into an office, rank or position.
definitions.example: He was installed as Chancellor of the University.
I installed myself in my usual chair by the fire.
